name: border-beam
description: An animated beam of light which travels along the border of its container.

props.name: className
props.description: Additional CSS classes for the beam element

props.name: size
props.description: Size of the beam in pixels

props.name: delay
props.description: Delay before the animation starts in seconds

props.name: duration
props.description: Duration of one full animation cycle in seconds

props.name: colorFrom
props.description: Starting gradient color of the beam

props.name: colorTo
props.description: Ending gradient color of the beam

props.name: style
props.description: Custom inline styles for the beam

props.name: reverse
props.description: Whether to reverse the animation direction

props.name: initialOffset
props.description: Initial offset position of the beam (0-100)

props.name: borderWidth
props.description: Width of the border in pixels
